div.h2: We are a nationally recognized, Blue Ribbon School, serving grades Kindergarten to Eighth at community–centered facilities on Pittsburgh’s Northside.
div.p: As one of the region’s oldest independent charter schools, we are committed to providing a superior education to children from all backgrounds in preparation for success in high school, college and beyond.

img.alt: School group picture at Avalon Park 2019

figure.span: We foster the dreams of all children by providing an outstanding and dynamic education in a nurturing environment.

div.p: Our Vision: We will continue to be an educational center of excellence and become a community pillar of support where students excel, families are engaged, teachers are empowered, and alumni flourish.

The Manchester Academic Charter School has operated as an independent charter school since 1998, with strong roots in the Manchester community reaching back over 50 years. School founders Dr. Betty Read More ...

Recognized locally and nationally over the past 20 years as a leader in designing a creative and dynamic free educational environment, Manchester Academic Charter School at the new Museum Lab™ Read More ...

For 20 years, the Manchester Academic Charter School mission has been to foster the dreams of all children by providing outstanding and dynamic education in a nurturing environment. We believe Read More ...

div.p: Governor Wolf announced all schools in the commonwealth will remain closed until the end of the school year as a result of the COVID-19 response efforts. MACS will utilize a variety of resources for our students online as well as enrichment and review packets for those without access to internet or digital tools at home.

strong.a: Click here for the MACS Continuity of Education Plan.
